channel.title: Messing with my ex (chatlogs)
channel.description:
Well yeah...here is a "conversation" I had with one of my EX's on AIM. I couldn't stop lol'ing
[code](5:07:58 PM) justinxradical: (5:04:25 PM) SlimzyLove: I don't give a fuck what you say! Rachel used to be my friend until you came around. So FUCK YOU and quit being such an asshole. GROW UP. (5:05:10 PM) justinxradical: ROFFLEEE (5:05:27 PM) SlimzyLove: ? (5:05:36 PM) justinxradical: lolllllllllllllzzzzzz (5:05:42 PM) SlimzyLove: what's so funny? (5:05:51 PM) justinxradical: you (5:05:59 PM) SlimzyLove: well obviously (5:06:01 PM) SlimzyLove: i got that much (5:06:16 PM) justinxradical: wow...you really are smart (5:06:26 PM) SlimzyLove: smarter than ya think (5:06:33 PM) justinxradical: O RLY? (5:06:37 PM) SlimzyLove: Yep. (5:07:05 PM) justinxradical: no no no no no! (5:07:07 PM) justinxradical: its YA RLY (5:07:43 PM) SlimzyLove: what's wrong with you? You fucked up or something? (5:07:58 PM) Unable to send message: Refused by client (5:08:08 PM) justinxradical: (5:04:25 PM) SlimzyLove: I don't give a fuck what you say! Rachel used to be my friend until you came around. So FUCK YOU and quit being such an asshole. GROW UP. (5:05:10 PM) justinxradical: ROFFLEEE (5:05:27 PM) SlimzyLove: ? (5:05:36 PM) justinxradical: lolllllllllllllzzzzzz (5:08:22 PM) SlimzyLove: uh huh (5:08:26 PM) justinxradical: (5:05:42 PM) SlimzyLove: what's so funny? (5:05:51 PM) justinxradical: you (5:05:59 PM) SlimzyLove: well obviously (5:06:01 PM) SlimzyLove: i got that much (5:06:16 PM) justinxradical: wow...you really are smart (5:06:26 PM) SlimzyLove: smarter than ya think (5:06:33 PM) justinxradical: O RLY? (5:08:32 PM) justinxradical: (5:06:37 PM) SlimzyLove: Yep. (5:07:05 PM) justinxradical: no no no no no! (5:07:07 PM) justinxradical: its YA RLY (5:07:43 PM) SlimzyLove: what's wrong with you? You fucked up or something? (5:08:38 PM) SlimzyLove: are you? (5:08:42 PM) justinxradical: lolz (5:08:44 PM) justinxradical: rofleee (5:08:48 PM) SlimzyLove: It seems like you're high or somethin (5:09:10 PM) justinxradical: O RLY? (5:09:35 PM) SlimzyLove: Wow Justin (5:09:41 PM) justinxradical: YA RLY (5:10:14 PM) SlimzyLove: I'm guessing that's a yes then (5:10:18 PM) justinxradical: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=bitches+be+crazy&go=Go (5:11:03 PM) SlimzyLove: Yes...us bitches can be crazy (5:12:09 PM) justinxradical: rep++; (5:12:15 PM) SlimzyLove: ??? (5:12:41 PM) justinxradical: lolz (5:12:58 PM) SlimzyLove: Wtf are you talkin about? (5:13:24 PM) justinxradical: if(User.isClueless()){ System.out.println("User is Clueless!"); User.cluelessSent = true; } (5:13:43 PM) SlimzyLove: Wow (5:15:01 PM) SlimzyLove: Fuck you dude, i'm outta here [/code]
posted in code tags to save room ;)
PS. I had to copy and paste some of it...because I forgot to start the log right away

item.title: Messing with my ex (chatlogs)

oh god, are you fucking serious, you do understand how old this topic is correct?

item.title: Messing with my ex (chatlogs)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

thats just sad… I mean it’s okay to be apart of communities like mopar but to try talk leet to people you know and say stupid stuff like that because you think you will “look cool on mopar” is very pathetic. If you think you would get good comments and congrats on this you have to be the most immature person I know.

Read full topic

item.title: Messing with my ex (chatlogs)
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Obviously it’s your ex-girlfriend.
Show some respect and be a man instead of being a prick to her…, just because she’s your ex-girlfriend it doesn’t mean you should hate eachother.
Also why don’t you say those things in real life? Are you scared?
I wonder how your dates were, if you ever had them.

Waffendennis:

You should draw a line between real life (your ex girl friend for example) and the internet (MITB), you’re acting like a big prick thats just 10 years old.

Agreed.

Read full topic

item.title: Messing with my ex (chatlogs)
item.dc:creator: @Waffendennis Waffendennis
item.description:
@Waffendennis wrote:

You’re so going to be a 40 year old virgin…

You should draw a line between real life (your ex girl friend for example) and the internet (MITB), you’re acting like a big prick thats just 10 years old.

Also I don’t see the point why you’re messing with her, since you’re just being ignorant and inmature and there is nothing funny about this… It’s rather sad seeing something like this.

But what ever floats your boat mate :)!

item.title: Messing with my ex (chatlogs)
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:15, topic:185077”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=246792.msg2080580#msg2080580 date=1204361471]
I bet that he’s a schizophrenic, and this ‘girl’ is just a figment of his screwed up imagination. He was really the one typing for SlimzyLove, and himself.
[/quote]
lolz…I wish…dating her was a big mistake =[/quote]
I have a feeling that you are holding back emotions of love for this woman [Let us call her Barbados - if you get this you watch too much Futurama :P]. Now, “Barbados” was too much for you to handle [are you holding back homosexuality, or are you just not ready for a serious relationship with a female?] so you decided to fag out upon her. You really should think about your actions before you decide to do something like that.
In conclusion:
I hate you. I hate people like you. Go die. In a ditch. In lots of pain. [This is an example of what you should NOT do.]
Grow up. [the right answer]

Read full topic
